title: Forget multitasking, try monotasking
description: People don't just cook anymore -- they're cooking, texting, talking on the phone, watching YouTube and uploading photos of the awesome meal they just made. Designer Paolo Cardini questions the efficiency of our multitasking world and makes the case for -- gasp -- "monotasking."
author: Paolo Cardini
keywords: TED, talks, culture, design, humor, product design, technology
